section.p: The journey from ADQL to SQL can be represented in the following way:
The base parser achieves the first part of this process, represented by the first arrow in the diagram.
The structure of the parser is roughly of the following form:

The top AdqlParser module is completely hand crafted. With some exceptions, the rest of the code is mostly generated using the JavaCC framework. AdqlStoX is in fact the main artifact and is the real parser generated by JavaCC. The AST Tree is a tree of about 90 modules initially generated to represent the ADQL syntax tree, but thereafter hand crafted. AdqlParser is a thick and convenient wrapper to generated code.
